name: flirtatiously
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
in a way that suggests you are sexually attracted to someone, especially not in a serious way: He leaned forward to kiss her flirtatiously. She smiled flirtatiously at Al. See
flirtatious
More examplesFewer examplesFor the first week she behaved flirtatiously with him.He stared flirtatiously into her eyes.She tossed her hair back flirtatiously.
